column2:
"Did you end up using some skill points?
I can tell. You've got that look on your face."

"I don't know how to explain it. It's like, you
have this look of confidence or something,
like someone I could really count on."

"Seeing you like that makes me want to
learn some skills, too!"

"Okay, I've made up my mind.
I'm gonna choose a skill and learn
the heck out of it!"
